Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE VIEW [VC_SecureMessage_Step05_Create_Tmp_Union_View] AS SELECT ssm.BEHAVIOR AS BEHAVIOR, ssm.CLASSIFICATION AS CLASSIFICATION, ssm.COMMENTS AS COMMENTS, ssm.CONFIG_ID AS CONFIG_ID, ssm.CREATED_BY_ID AS CREATED_BY_ID, ssm.CREATED_ON AS CREATED_ON, ssm.CREATED_ON_TICK AS CREATED_ON_TICK, ssm.CSS AS CSS, ssm.CURRENT_STATE AS CURRENT_STATE, ssm.DISABLED_ON AS DISABLED_ON, ssm.DISABLED_BY_ID AS DISABLED_BY_ID, ssm.GENERATION AS GENERATION, ssm.ID AS ID, ssm.IS_CURRENT AS IS_CURRENT, ssm.IS_RELEASED IS_RELEASED, ssm.ITEM_CONFIG_ID AS ITEM_CONFIG_ID, ssm.ITEM_ID AS ITEM_ID, ssm.ITEM_TYPE_ID AS ITEM_TYPE_ID, ssm.ITEM_MAJOR_REV AS ITEM_MAJOR_REV, ssm.ITEM_STATE AS ITEM_STATE, ssm.ITEM_TYPE_NAME AS ITEM_TYPE_NAME, ssm.ITEM_VERSION AS ITEM_VERSION, ssm.KEYED_NAME AS KEYED_NAME, ssm.LOCKED_BY_ID AS LOCKED_BY_ID, ssm.MAJOR_REV AS MAJOR_REV, ssm.MANAGED_BY_ID AS MANAGED_BY_ID, ssm.MINOR_REV AS MINOR_REV, ssm.MODIFIED_BY_ID AS MODIFIED_BY_ID, ssm.MODIFIED_ON AS MODIFIED_ON, ssm.NEW_VERSION AS NEW_VERSION, ssm.NOT_LOCKABLE AS NOT_LOCKABLE, ssm.OWNED_BY_ID AS OWNED_BY_ID, ssm.PERMISSION_ID AS PERMISSION_ID, ssm.RELATED_ID AS RELATED_ID, ssm.REPLY_TO_ID AS REPLY_TO_ID, ssm.SM_DATA AS SM_DATA, ssm.SORT_ORDER AS SORT_ORDER, ssm.SOURCE_ID AS SOURCE_ID, ssm.STATE AS STATE, ssm.TEAM_ID AS TEAM_ID, ssm.THREAD_ID AS THREAD_ID, ssm.ITEM_KEYED_NAME as ITEM_KEYED_NAME, ssm.HIGHLIGHTED_TEXT as HIGHLIGHTED_TEXT FROM innovator.[STOREDSECUREMESSAGE] AS ssm UNION ALL SELECT hsm.[BEHAVIOR], hsm.[CLASSIFICATION], hsm.[COMMENTS], hsm.[CONFIG_ID], hsm.[CREATED_BY_ID], hsm.[CREATED_ON], hsm.[CREATED_ON_TICK], hsm.[CSS], hsm.[CURRENT_STATE], hsm.[DISABLED_ON], hsm.[DISABLED_BY_ID], hsm.[GENERATION], hsm.[ID], hsm.[IS_CURRENT], hsm.[IS_RELEASED], hsm.[ITEM_CONFIG_ID], hsm.[ITEM_ID] AS ITEM_ID, hsm.[ITEM_TYPE_ID], hsm.[ITEM_MAJOR_REV], hsm.[ITEM_STATE], hsm.[ITEM_TYPE_NAME], hsm.[ITEM_VERSION], hsm.[KEYED_NAME], hsm.[LOCKED_BY_ID], hsm.[MAJOR_REV], hsm.[MANAGED_BY_ID], hsm.[MINOR_REV], hsm.[MODIFIED_BY_ID], hsm.[MODIFIED_ON], hsm.[NEW_VERSION], hsm.[NOT_LOCKABLE], hsm.[OWNED_BY_ID], hsm.[PERMISSION_ID], hsm.[RELATED_ID], hsm.[REPLY_TO_ID], hsm.[SM_DATA], hsm.[SORT_ORDER], hsm.[SOURCE_ID], hsm.[STATE], hsm.[TEAM_ID], hsm.[THREAD_ID], hsm.[ITEM_KEYED_NAME], hsm.[HIGHLIGHTED_TEXT] FROM innovator.[HISTORYSECUREMESSAGE] as hsm
Item.name: VC_SecureMessage_Step05_Create_Tmp_Union_View
